message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This is a special offer tailored to your needs and I'm confident it will be a mutually beneficial deal.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I agree that this product would be valuable for my business, but I'm working with a tighter budget than that.  Would you be willing to come down to $800,000?

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. While I'm unable to match the full asking price, I'd like to extend an offer of $850,000 for the product. This price reflects the value we believe it holds for your business while remaining competitive within our current market conditions.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. To be completely transparent, I've found a similar product elsewhere for $1,000,000.  To make a deal work with you, I'd need you to come down to $825,000.  This would make it worth my while to go with your product.

I appreciate your openness, Bob. Considering your needs and the competitive landscape, I am willing to offer the product at $840,000. This price takes into account the value of the product to your business and remains a strong offer within our current market conditions.
